org.team1540.base.drive

Class PowerJoystickScaling

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.team1540.base.drive.PowerJoystickScaling
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JoystickScaling

    public class PowerJoystickScaling
extends Object
implements JoystickScaling
    Joystick scaling based on raising the joystick input to a set power.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PowerJoystickScaling(double pow)
      Creates a new PowerJoystickScaling instance with the provided power.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getPow() 
      double scale(double input)
      Scales the provided input using the equation |input|pow, where pow is the power set via constructor or using setPow().
      void setPow(double pow)

    • Constructor Detail

      • PowerJoystickScaling

        public PowerJoystickScaling(double pow)
        Creates a new PowerJoystickScaling instance with the provided power.
        Parameters:
        pow - The power to raise the joystick input to during scaling.

    • Method Detail

      • scale

        public double scale(double input)
        Scales the provided input using the equation |input|pow, where pow is the power set via constructor or using setPow().
        Specified by:
        scale in interface JoystickScaling
        Parameters:
        input - The input to scale.
        Returns:
        The absolute value of the input, raised to a specified power, with the sign (positive or negative) of the original input.
